DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability , potential immune response AMG 167 follow multiple subcutaneous ( SC , injection skin ) dose administration healthy men postmenopausal woman low bone mineral density .
DOC.brief_title: An Ascending Multiple Dose Study Evaluating AMG 167 Healthy Men Postmenopausal Women With Low Bone Mineral Density
DOC.criteria: Low bone mineral density determine time screen [ define bone mineral density ( BMD ) Tscores lumbar spine ( L1L4 ) , total evaluable vertebra ( few L1L4 ) ; femoral neck 1.0 2.5 , exclusive ] 25hydroxyvitamin D ≥ 20 ng/mL Willing able take ≥ 1,000 mg elemental calcium ≥ 800 IU ( ≤ 1,000 IU ) vitamin D daily upon enrollment Osteoporosis , define BMD Tscores lumbar spine ( L1L4 ) total evaluable vertebra ( few L1L4 ) ; femoral neck ≤ 2.5 History vertebral fracture , fragility fracture ( fracture result minor trauma ; ie , fall stand height less ) wrist , humerus , hip , pelvis age 50 Diagnosed condition affect bone metabolism Diagnosis clot factor deficiency history bleed coagulation disorder History spinal stenosis History facial nerve paralysis Exclusion Criteria Cohort 7 Substudy ( Transition Alendronate ) : Contraindicated intolerant alendronate therapy
